name: San Francisco Food Not Bombs
description: Food Not Bombs arranges the collection of produce, bread and other food that can't be sold from grocery stores, bakeries, and produce markets. They cook and prepare hot food and will continue to serve from the schedule time until they run out. Note: Servings may cancel in the event of rain. Call or email before going to see FNB.
